name: Ace Editor
description: The Ace Editor component is the high-performance code editor for the web.

properties.name: readOnly
properties.label: Read Only
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to disable editing of the component value.

properties.name: name
properties.label: Name
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the name of a component.

properties.name: value
properties.label: Value
properties.settingTooltip: The value you specify with this handler will be displayed in this component.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add value to the component.

properties.name: mode
properties.label: Mode
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to select the mode of a component.
properties.settingTooltip: The highlight and auto-completion will work according to the selected mode.

properties.name: theme
properties.label: Theme
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to select the theme of a component.

properties.name: foldStyle
properties.label: Fold Style
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to select the fold style.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.label: Placeholder
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the placeholder for a component.
properties.settingTooltip: A placeholder will be displayed if the component has no value.

properties.name: width
properties.label: Width
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the width of a component.

properties.name: height
properties.label: Height
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the height of a component.

properties.name: fontSize
properties.label: Font Size
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the font size for the value of a component.

properties.name: tabSize
properties.label: Tab Size
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the tab size.

properties.name: printMarginColumn
properties.label: Print Margin Column
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the print margin column.

properties.name: printMarginVisibility
properties.label: Print Margin Visibility
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to control the visibility of the print margin.

properties.name: gutterVisibility
properties.label: Gutter Visibility
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to control the visibility of the gutter.

properties.name: autocompletion
properties.label: Autocompletion
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add auto-completion capability for a component.

properties.name: highlightActiveLine
properties.label: Highlight Active Line
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add a highlight for the active line.
properties.settingTooltip: The line in which the cursor is located will be highlighted

properties.name: highlightSelectedWord
properties.label: Highlight Selected Word
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add the ability to highlight the selected word.

properties.name: showInvisibles
properties.label: Show Invisibles
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add the ability to highlight empty spaces.

eventHandlers.name: onChange
eventHandlers.label: On Change
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when the value of the component changes.
